title: How to Make Indian Mashed Potatoes

steps.headline: Gather the ingredients as written above.
Boil the potatoes in the cooker.
Let it cool down for 10 minutes.
Add the desired amount of salt.
If you want you can also add Black pepper.

text: Gather the ingredients as written above.  Boil the potatoes in the cooker.  Open after hearing the 4-5 whistles.  Place them in a bowl.  Let it cool down for 10 minutes.  Peel them with your hands.  Cut them in squares.  Mash them out. (with hands or masher) Add the desired amount of salt.  Add red chili powder.  If you want you can also add Black pepper.  Serve Hot.
